WorkItem.Description:
* implement a language service host and use it with a language service
* change a compilation setting in the host - e.g. enable generating declaration files
* get the emit out
-> the updated setting isn't honored
WorkItem.Summary: language service doesn't honor changing compilation setteing

Comments.Message:
This is the current design, it looks like you need to do a typecheck after the setting change. We are considering changing this.

Marked as active.
